title: Yesterday there was a boat beached on the shore of the north end of Carolina Beach.  It belonged to a surveying company.  What was the story?  How did it happen to wash up, were they able to recover it, what were the surveyors doing there  in the first place?
text:
Without some more details, it's hard to say. But there are several
dredging and sand-pumping projects either going on or coming up soon,
so it may be that a survey boat was part of that.
